publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3498 Hugh O’Donnell: Voice of Experience Forum Home Safety Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Voice of Experience Forum (VOEF) on its recent home safety campaign, aimed at raising awareness of cold calling, in partnership with Trading Standards and the North Lanarkshire Council Bogus Caller Task Force, and commends the work of VOEF on promoting the inclusion of older people in the community and articulating the needs and wishes of older people in North Lanarkshire.
S3M-3498 Voice of Experience Forum Home Safety Campaign (lodged on 23 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3498 Voice of Experience Forum Home Safety Campaign (lodged on 23 February 2009) Angela Constance*, Bob Doris*, Robin Harper*, Jim Tolson*, Mike Pringle*

S3M-3498 Hugh O’Donnell: Voice of Experience Forum Home Safety Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Voice of Experience Forum (VOEF) on its recent home safety campaign, aimed at raising awareness of cold calling, in partnership with Trading Standards and the North Lanarkshire Council Bogus Caller Task Force, and commends the work of VOEF on promoting the inclusion of older people in the community and articulating the needs and wishes of older people in North Lanarkshire. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Kenneth Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Sandra White, Christina McKelvie, Angela Constance, Bob Doris, Robin Harper, Jim Tolson, Mike Pringle, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3498 Voice of Experience Forum Home Safety Campaign (lodged on 23 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
